website_summaries.verdict: Arguably the most popular item finder on the market. Tile offers a sleek tracking device with an easy-to-use app that allows you to track down lost items.
pros: The Tile is small and compact and pairing it via Bluetooth is a cinch
The app is intuitive and easy to use and up front costs for the device are low
The sleek Tile is a great choice for tracking virtually anything
cons: Battery can't be recharged or replaced so it will only last about a year
You also need to keep the app running in the background for phone tracking purposes

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t help us find lost wallet.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for husband who always loses/misplaces his wallet. Nice, sleek design. Fit nicely into wallet. Tile worked when we tested it. However a few days later when he actually misplaced his wallet, tile didn’t work! Luckily we found the wallet, but tile won’t connect to phone. It doesn’t work!
customer_reviews.author: Gravalop

customer_reviews.title: When silence is frustrating
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two Tiles for my wife and I keys with nothing less than stellar results, this wallet tile is disappointing. I did this setup everything seemed to be fine, after a week I decided to try it out. I couldn't hear from the next room my first thought was the battery must be dead, I picked up my wallet and I can just barely hear the musical tune. I wrote an email to technical support, the short version that's as loud as it gets. Hopefully, in the future Tile will improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Who me?

customer_reviews.title: Makes you buy another in a year due to planned obsolescence (aka it becomes useless).
customer_reviews.text: The product is great and does as it says, but the thing I HATE is that the batteries are not changeable... So they expect you to buy another in a year... The thing is not even water proof, so why does accessing the battery have to be non existent? You can tear it open and replace the battery, but good luck ever closing it properly again. Disappointing...
customer_reviews.author: Garin

customer_reviews.title: Game changer
customer_reviews.text: This is a game changer. I honestly don't know how I lived before I got this. I would lose my wallet every single day and be scrambling in the morning to find it before I left for work. No longer. I find that I can keep track of it better and barely need to use the beeper anymore. It's loud and noticeable for how small it is. I've had no issues hearing the ring even muffled under piles of clothes that lay around that I wish someone would finally get to washing. Can't fix all issues I suppose.
customer_reviews.author: X

customer_reviews.title: Helpful -ish
customer_reviews.text: This is nothing spectacular. It has helped me find muni wallet when it is somewhere in my house but if you are far away from it it’s basicallt useless. You have to get close enough to the tile to be able to play the sound. It also seems to be very flimsy. I’m aware that structural strength needs to be sacrificed in order to achieve such a small package which is able to fit in a wallet. But it seems as if it would break very easily with little to know force.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great! Accidentally washed it, works fine! Emergency kid tracker!
customer_reviews.text: Incredible little device! Tracks very well with the app. I think anyone that has gotten frustrated, may be a result of the location settings. There are many pop ups initially that you must approve on iPhone, to ensure background tracking. I have not noticed any significant loss in battery life from turning on tracking features. I put this item in my 5 year olds pants as an emergency tracker if we enter public spaces. Gives me that extra piece of mind. By accident, I forgot to pull out the device, and I washed his pants. Tile continues to work like a charm! 5 stars no doubt!
customer_reviews.author: Beanjapan

customer_reviews.title: Connection issues makes this useless
customer_reviews.text: The idea and hardware is great but it is overshadowed by just how aweful the software is. I can walk around my house searching for my wallet for a solid 20 minutes and it still won't connect. Multiple times have I had to find it the old fashion way and when I do, I set it right next to my phone and it'll just read "nearby". Dont waste your money on this. 1/5 would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Phong Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Look into alternatives.
customer_reviews.text: As you can tell from the reviews, this thing is super hit or miss. The only thing it does consistently is *not* work backgrounds. I've literally never been able to use the tile to make my phone ring. I had fairly low expectations, but I bought it anyway thinking even if it only helps one time, it'll be worth it. That day has yet to come. If you're on a budget, I would recommend waiting for a better alternative or researching competitors. In case it matters, I have used it with an iPhone 5s, iPhone 6 Plus, and iPhone 6. All the same results aka spotty at best.
customer_reviews.author: Big Momma

customer_reviews.title: Crap!
customer_reviews.text: This not only didn't work when I lost my wallet but also gave told me that the last location was at my home at night after I got back from work. Made me think that I dropped it when I stepped out of the car or something. It was back at work but I trusted tile and didn't check work fully for a few days.
customer_reviews.author: hamid sani

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much useless
customer_reviews.text: I haven't been able to find my wallet twice. Tried using the app, and it couldn't find the wallet. My wallet was 10 feet away under my keyboard. The app said it hadn't connected to tile in 7 days. I had been carrying my wallet and phone in the same hand the day before. After I found my wallet the tile app found the tile. While it was in my hand.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Duncan

customer_reviews.title: And the search for your wallet off this is so pathetic it requires others to be near your wallet to ...
customer_reviews.text: What a joke. You can't even hear the beep it makes to find it in the same room, let alone around your house. And the search for your wallet off this is so pathetic it requires others to be near your wallet to find it. Mine has never shown itself to be anywhere but where I first initiated it...never has moved. Wish I could send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Works very well within limits
customer_reviews.text: I use this device to locate my wife's medication bag. Sometimes she doesn't remember where she placed it. Works very well within the confines of a room. Not loud enough to find within a space the size of an entire house. However, moving from room to room while listening for it's signal will locate the tile and what it has been attached to.
customer_reviews.author: CGYjr

customer_reviews.title: Love  the Tiles, worth the $ - repeat customer purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased several Tiles in 2016 for my keys, wallet and phone. They were effective for fining those items, but didn't have a replaceable battery, and the Slim Tile didn't yet exist. I just replaced all my old Tiles with the Slim and Pro. Love these things. I put the Slim Tile in my phone's cover. I also purchased several Tiles for a friend with memory problems. He called me when he lost his keys, and used the Tile APP and immediately found his keys. We both love these things. Saves time and aggravation when you loose items. Can't rate tech support as I didn't need to use Tech support. Can't rate battery life as I just got the Tiles.
customer_reviews.author: Chrystel

customer_reviews.title: It is pretty much useless
customer_reviews.text: The Tile does not use GPS to find your wallet. We tested it by placing it in a hidden spot and the "circle" in which the phone directed us to find the tile was wrong. The circle shown was not where the tile was. The ringer to find it once you are 100 feet from it is not loud enough to hear until you are almost right next to it. I would return it, but we didn't test it until it was too late to return. It is pretty much useless.
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: Stick to the original tile
customer_reviews.text: Have it in my car and does not pick up signal until right on top of my car. I have a bunch of the smaller tiles original ones and they work great.
customer_reviews.author: buyer

customer_reviews.title: 1/3 have failed within a year
customer_reviews.text: About a third of the Tiles that I have purchased and activated have failed within a year. What's the point of having a Tile if there's a high likelihood it won't work when you're trying to find your item? Tile has RMA'd a couple of my defective Tiles, but I have zero confidence that the Tiles I own will work when I press the "Find" button. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Nobody in particular

customer_reviews.title: The best gift you could give a boyfriend who loses things
customer_reviews.text: The best gift you could give a boyfriend who loses things! It actually has a sensor that beeps louder/quicker when you are getting close to your item ! Perfect for someone who loses their things INSIDE THE HOUSE. It will also display the last known location your item was- I think this works better than those Lost/Stolen phone apps. I plan to buy one for my phone and keys too!
customer_reviews.author: HamburgerHelper

customer_reviews.title: Better than nothing, but annoying
customer_reviews.text: The Tile Pros (or equivalent) are the only Tiles worth buying. I will still always have one of these in my wallet because it's the only thing that will fit. Where they don't measure up: - Tile Pros have WAY more range - these are VERY spotty, and should be used for disaster recovery instead of daily finding needs - sometimes the button does nothing, and most of the time, it's just not findable I'm not sure if it's because these get messed up from sitting on them, but I try to keep my wallet in my front pocket. Still, these are spotty no matter what.
customer_reviews.author: John D.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Our middle kiddo with autism loves to hide devices once the battery dies (i.e. behind couches, beds and dressers.) Not sure if he is mad at it for dying, but we can't loose any devices because he is non-verbal that is method of communication, AAC. Now we just walk around, look for the green circle, then play the melody... bam the device is found in no time. We have one less struggle on our ASD plate! And in our crazy life, that is very much appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: WineNot

customer_reviews.title: battery cannot be replaced (that's how they get you)
customer_reviews.text: so.. thats how they get you, also I bought this for my veryyy senior uncle which keeps misplacing either his phone or his wallet, so even though it is slim to fit in his wallet, it is not loud enough for him to hear it.... so bottomline is not going to be that useful:( I can hear it though hehehe, but i think you would be better served if you choose the latest version that you can replace the battery
customer_reviews.author: wildfox

customer_reviews.title: Decently useful but don’t bother with the Premium subscription
customer_reviews.text: I got this because I keep misplacing my wallet. It’s bigger than I expected but fits in a credit card slot. I tried the Premium version of the app that offers alerts if you leave home without it but it was useless, half the time I didn’t get the alerts and the rest of the time I would be miles away before they came through. Save your money on that part of it.
customer_reviews.author: K.A.

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Previously, I really licked Tile slims. I attached a Tile Slim to my Kindle and wallet because I always lost them. For the first two years, it was awesome. 2019? Not so much. I can literally stand within 3 feet of the Kindle/wallet and it will tell me it was last seen 13 miles away. Connecting. . . . never. I don't know what they did to these things or their app, but now, you might as well attach a string to your item or duct tape it to you because you won't find it with your Tile Slim
customer_reviews.author: chrisp339

customer_reviews.title: Not very slim.
customer_reviews.text: In the picture I've included you can see the time is two sections. Each section is less slim than any not slim section. Also it continuously uploads your location to tile. I only leave the app running when I travel. Too many third parties wanting to track my data.
customer_reviews.author: abaet

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK AND TILE WON'T HONOR WARRANTY ON PRODUCTS SOLD THROUGH AMAZON.
customer_reviews.text: Simply does not work. Worse, manufacturer said it will not honor its warranty on products sold through Amazon. I own other Tiles. They worked. This one doesn't, and I'm stuck.
customer_reviews.author: great necker

customer_reviews.title: No more lost wallet!
customer_reviews.text: Tile is a great company. I’ve had other tiles and they’ve helped me countless times. This slim is perfect for my wallet, and while it isn’t as loud as other models it works well enough. The great part is that millions of tile users can help you locate your stuff if it goes missing, all with complete privacy! The battery lasts a very long time. I probably replace them once a year. Would be nice to see a slim model with a replaceable battery.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel BosticTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Replace Every Year
customer_reviews.text: I wife and I have several different Tiles that we use to make sure that we can find lost items. We have them on our car keys, and in our billfolds. They seem to work well. The Slim fits better in our wallets. However the battery in the Slim only lasts for about a year, and then you have to replace the entire Tile, which is expensive. When I need to replace one, I will probably get one with a replaceable battery.
customer_reviews.author: John Churchill

customer_reviews.title: Good except for non-replaceable battery.
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Everything seems to be working as advertised. The Tile Slim activated and paired without issue. I am not a fan of the non-replaceable battery though. I will make the decision in a year whether to replace the entire Tile or go with one that has a replaceable battery
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far, my bf loves this because he constantly ...
customer_reviews.text: So far, my bf loves this because he constantly loses his wallet. It's very slim and fits right in his wallet (though ideally, it would be slimmer - it's not as slim as a credit card, that's for sure). It's also very light weight and the sound is clear. I have read that the battery life on these isn't long - not more than a year or two - but since they're not too expensive, well, perhaps there's a trade-off. I would have given this five stars if I haven't been hearing about the short battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Pico

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about this prodect but I was quickly let down once I received it. The app was unable to find the device even at only 5' away. Returned the next day.
customer_reviews.author: VetMedNut

customer_reviews.title: Lost wallet no longer!
customer_reviews.text: My husband lost his wallet in the house about once every few weeks until I bought this slim tile. The day it arrived he complained that he did not need a tile to find his wallet. He lost his wallet in the house the very next day and was able to quickly find it. We have not had to search the house for his wallet ever since. I bought the tile slim over a year ago. It has been worth every penny I spent on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Where is your wallet?
customer_reviews.text: I am sure that it is slimmer than the other tiles but I would have been better off with the keychain style one for keeping track of my clutch wallet as it has a spot for a wrist strap. Also not horribly loud when say under a pile of laundry lol. However it did put my mind at ease when I left my wallet at work, knowing it was there, or knowing it was home when I was at work and that I did not drop it somewhere in between.
customer_reviews.author: Anne R

customer_reviews.title: Haven't had to use this new tile yet but loved the old one for my car keys and have ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had to use this new tile yet but loved the old one for my car keys and have used that several times when I can't find my keys in the room. Just make sure that the while the app may always be in your open apps that you click on it once in a while to make sure that it is booted up and not in a sort of off state. I think maybe this also happens when updating the app.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky

customer_reviews.title: Broken from the get go
customer_reviews.text: The tile was broken from the get go. It wouldn’t turn on or pair or play a run etc. I bought this as a birthday gift for my husband and was excited it would arrive in time before he had to leave on a business trip. Well the package arrived intact with the tile completely unresponsive. Very dissapoining for such a highly rated product with very little tech to go wrong within the little machine. It makes me seriously question how long the tile will hold up during normal use in a wallet if it couldn’t handle a cushioned USPS delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Chime Dies
customer_reviews.text: Total crap! Battery life is terrible. But even worse - on every Tile I’ve owned, the chime stops working after a few months. So... if your Tile is nearby, you need to hunt for it (at least you know it’s nearby though). Total garbage and a waste of money. There are better, more reliable choices out there.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Littlefield

customer_reviews.title: Find my Trash Can
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased both the 'Mate' and 'slim' model (non-replaceable battery) and both have been replaced by the manufacturer only to fail again. I can have my keys and wallet in my pocket and the app cannot see them. Tile is suppose to be the leading brand but will be moving onto to something else. When I need to find something I NEED to find them and not be concerned over whether they have malfunctioned.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Roe

customer_reviews.title: and I can even ask alexa to have tile ring my phone which is great. BUY IT
customer_reviews.text: I live by my tile. I had a trackr for about a year, and it was never reliable. I switched to tile finally, and I will never go back. On my keys, in my wallet, and I can use them to find my phone?? Sign me up. I am perpetually loosing everything, and I can even ask alexa to have tile ring my phone which is great. BUY IT.
customer_reviews.author: Devon Atkinson

customer_reviews.title: Can only hear it if out in the open (even ...
customer_reviews.text: Can only hear it if out in the open (even just under a blanket it's extremely muffled). Map feature only identifies as being in "our house".
customer_reviews.author: crichter

customer_reviews.title: While the Tile Slim model would function perfect in a woman's purse
customer_reviews.text: While the Tile Slim model would function perfect in a woman's purse, luggage, backpack, etc., It doesn't function in a man's wallet, back pants pocket. Many times I'd be driving, then my butt's pressure would activate the center switch and ring my phone, and why I had to return it and why I rated it at 4 stars. I do own the waterproof Tile Sport Model for my key chain...That's the best thing since sliced bread!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rex here in the Big Easy!

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Useless, very quiet, the effective range is only 5-10 feet in an open area.
customer_reviews.author: x0054

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of tile. I had the key chain version that I smashed into my wallet. This version hides in the wallet without me even knowing. Although, I hate having to repurchase every year (battery last a year and you can't change it). Tile has help me find my stuff much faster then looking by myself. Totally worth the purchase price!
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: MUST have
customer_reviews.text: I love the Tiles! I tend to misplace my wallet a lot and lose it and this little thing helps me find it every time! Not only can you make it RING when you're in the vicinity of it but since it's a community ran service in the app, it pings the last location it was in for you to go fetch it! Love it and strongly recommend it if you misplace things!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: It’s fine
customer_reviews.text: I’m not clear on the GPS aspect... because it just beeps if you activate it. Maybe there is a map interaction, but I really think this is more like a pinging for you to hear it and find it that way than an ACTUAL GPS tracker. Maybe I’m wrong. But it’s not worth it to drain my battery by keeping location services on to beep at myself. Hope this helps!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Find your stuff
customer_reviews.text: Misplaced my wallet. You walk around until ap turns green, which means you are close, then hit find on ap and tile rings. I have 5 tiles which you can name. Wallet, purse, keys etc. You do have to be fairly close to hear the tile ring, but works well for as small as the tile is. On the downside it is not nearly as powerful as find my iPhone, but that is to be expected given the size of the tiles.
customer_reviews.author: S Smith MD

customer_reviews.title: Worked only long enough to connect to my phone.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thinking "great i will never lose my wallet again" I was so excited. Turns out the thing stopped working after the first 2 weeks. I tried to contact the tile support team. Sent multiple reports. Never heard anything back. Wasted my money. However the original tile has served me well for over a year. Slim version just seems to be poorly made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't put in wallet @ back pants pocket
customer_reviews.text: Guys if you want to put the tile slim in your wallet, and you place your wallet in the back pocket of your pants like most men do...beware! I am not heavy but frequently when I sit down the tile push a button and rings my phone. It's so annoying!!! I can be in business meetings and my phone just starts to ring even on silent mode. I wrote to customer service and the "find my phone" feature can not be disabled. I just want to find my wallet. This is not up to my expectations and I stopped using it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark&Pao

customer_reviews.title: Great idea...very poor execution
customer_reviews.text: Very unreliable device. Often the Tile is unable to assist me locating keys that are less than 15 feet from the area I am searching with my phone. Same issue when using the Tile to locate phone. Rarely works as advertised, and in my opinion a waste of money. It is a great concept...hopefullly in the future a company will be able to make it work. Tile Inc, unfortunately, has not.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Duffy

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working within a few months, but product is a great idea
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend for Christmas and by March the Tile no longer worked :( I like the idea of this, especially how it uses other Tile users to locate your wallet/keys/whatever when they're lost, but I just wish the product worked.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was a lifesaver many times in finding my wallet & I really liked the slim design
customer_reviews.text: Bought the Tile Slim in September 2016 & it stopped working about a month ago. Product description states battery will last 1 year, mine only worked for about 4 1/2 months. It was a lifesaver many times in finding my wallet & I really liked the slim design, but will look try another product hoping will last longer. Very disappointed, worked great at first, but doesn't last long.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great however the range is almost non existent IF placed ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great however the range is almost non existent IF placed in a RFID protected wallet/purse. Be sure to consider this. I had to change my wallet and search very hard to find a non RFID wallet. It's no fault of tile as I believe this is simply a Bluetooth limitation. After taking it out of the RFID protected wallet the range went from be able to detect the tile with my phone from 6ft away to almost an entire house.
customer_reviews.author: Maeger Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and use and makes finding his keys so much quicker!. Would definitely recommend for items that always seem to be getting lost like keys, phones, badges.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is pretty much worthless
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty much worthless. The sounds level is extremely low, making it almost impossible to hear, even when it is out in the open. When in a wallet, you can't hear it at all. So good luck using this to find a misplaced wallet!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So the idea of the product is great. But you need to keep the application open ...
customer_reviews.text: So the idea of the product is great. But you need to keep the application open and your Bluetooth on 24/7 if you want it to keep up with you. Which is incredibly annoying. I like that I can use the tile to find my phone, but finding my wallet is a pain. Sometimes I’ll be in the same room as it and it won’t register.
customer_reviews.author: Banana Bread

customer_reviews.title: Can’t find it if I can’t hear it.
customer_reviews.text: This model isn’t worth buying. The ring volume is so quiet you have to be standing right next to it and you will still barely hear the ring. There is no volume control. I am using it to find my IPad when I can’t remember where I left in the house. But I have to find the IPad just to hear the ringing. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Bananaball50

customer_reviews.title: this item requires adhesive (not included) and cannot be heard in loud environments
customer_reviews.text: my tile pro - on my keys - can be heard almost everywhere and is well worth the money spent. Excellent and supremely useful product. It will also find your phone even if its on silent (if you have your keys). This has saved me time in excess of the limited (inexpensive) cost that I spent and I heartily recommend it. I am in the process of returning the tile slim. If you put the slim inside your wallet you will NEVER hear it.
customer_reviews.author: Ltlantnee

customer_reviews.title: Nothing slim and app hard to set up
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely not slim like a CC. i will say it is 2-3 x a credit card. I wish it was slimmer. App was also hard to set up. It wouldn't let me use just email but only worked until I signed up with Facebook. I was forced to share all my details there. No options for privacy. Smart concept and app seems good. Only downside is that certain features you have to pay for. E.g. leaving your house without the wallet alert.
customer_reviews.author: Mick Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Pays for itself!!
customer_reviews.text: Used once, Tile(s) pay for themselves. The cost of losing your car key is huge. Tile not only finds the item, but tells you where it is!
customer_reviews.author: MEM

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Like most husbands mine has the incredible ability to lose just about anything between the front door and the back door. This didn’t fit great in his phone but we needed one for his wallet also and just having the app open on the phone allows you to ping the phone. So far it’s been working great:
customer_reviews.author: AmznJunkieX

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the One-Who-Loses-Everything
customer_reviews.text: A true life-saver! This is an absolute must, especially if your husband "misplaces" items regularly. After losing his wallet (luckily it has since been found unharmed) I added to our Tile family with the Slim Tile to place in his new wallet. It has already come in handy! We have Tiles on our keys as well, and have used them numerous times. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: kcotton4166

customer_reviews.title: ring ring ring heres your wallet you vacant dunce
customer_reviews.text: here it is airhead. heres your wallet you left oh the porch?????? for some reason???????? found it for you einstein
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: Seems to only work within proximity
customer_reviews.text: I seem to run into issues with this tile, that it doesn't update locations until four days later, making it difficult to track my wallet's last location (if I can't find it at home or in my car). It also doesn't ring my phone like it should, however, it does work when I need to find my wallet within my proximity
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Kauffman

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Much Worthless
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend always loses her phone so I though this would be perfect to attach to the back of it, download the app on MY Phone and viola! we can always see where her phone is from my phone. WRONG! you have to be "close" to it to have the app ring the phone. So, what happens in 75% of the time when the phone is not close by? You're screwed. We are better off just using the free app from apple "Find my Friends" to see where her phone is. Usually it is left in an Uber somewhere. haha
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Your wallet will get lost anyway
customer_reviews.text: Ok, i bought this thing to find my wallet once i lost it. I was expecting it would alert me whenever i was in a distance without my wallet. however thats not the case. says i was out of range or last seen 13 hours ago. like really? completely waste of my money i looked for it myself couldnt find it. so whats the point of this thing? would rather have my money back unless there is a out of range feature on it, because it is really annoying when i buy a product and dosent do what i expect it to do. Wont ever purchase a tile product again and am canceling my $30 yearly plan.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Worked great, until it fell out of the pocket in ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked great, until it fell out of the pocket in my wallet I had been keeping it in for months. It fell on the floor of a bar and since it looks too much like a cheap clothing tag, the bar threw it out as trash and did not put it in lost and found. I tracked it to the bar, nice and easy, but it will never show up again. because it's in a bag of trash in a landfill, somewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph R. Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Forgettful People!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my brother as a gift and he has lost his wallet three times so far, and this has saved it each time! Great purchase for someone forgetful or prone to losing their wallet!
customer_reviews.author: Taylar M.

customer_reviews.title: I really liked this at first
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this at first, worked well, but I bought in December, on may 10 it died and can not change batteries as built in
customer_reviews.author: JBender

customer_reviews.title: MAKES THEFT ALARMS GO OFF AT SOME STORES
customer_reviews.text: The tile makes the THEFT ALARM go off at certain stores. So far I've been accused of stealing at Big Five Sporting Goods, and at Lowe's Home Improvement center. I don't know how at many more stores this will happen. It's embarrassing. If you're good at talking your way out of stuff then they won't call the police. Otherwise you'll have to wait until the cops come and test the door theft alarm with your wallet.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Piece of mind for luggage
customer_reviews.text: Been using these for about 2 years now. This version is even slimmer than previous models and works just as well. I use it for piece of mind to see where my luggage is at the airport. I wish they didn't need to be replaced every year. Would be great if they lasted a little longer but the discount on the replacement is a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: jhelms54

customer_reviews.title: I love the tile
customer_reviews.text: I love the tile. I always lose my wallet, and it's been helping me keep track of where my wallet & keys are.
customer_reviews.author: Daam Bia Kim

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind for a anxious people who are prone to losing things
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had a Tile Mate for my keys for the past year and a half or so. It’s super handy. I picked up the slim because it was as a good deal and happened to be on the treasure truck on my way home from work. I also had a recent experience where I thought I lost my wallet and cancelled my cards before I found it in my car. *face palm* Both give me peace of mind when I can’t find my keys or wallet. My mate has lasted 6 months beyond its estimated battery life and is still at half of its life. I hope the slim holds up as well as the mate but we will see.
customer_reviews.author: carys fisher

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I have had this Tile Mate for a year, and finally the battery died. Ordered a replacement Mate and it was lost by the parcel service. Tile customer service came to the rescue and sent me the replacement for the replacement!!! Very happy with Tile! I just paired it with my phone, and it see’s the Mate as a Slim. A little confusing, but it still works fine! Great product! You will want these for your wallet, your keys, your bike, even the jacket you always seem to leave at the restaurant... I hope they make a new version that has a longer battery life!
customer_reviews.author: Double Nickel

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Dad as a Christmas present, after 2 months it has completely stopped working and will not turn on. He really liked it when it worked but was very disappointed when it wouldn't turn on after such amount of time. For 30 dollars for a small tile I expect it to work for the amount of time that is promised. Would have bought again, but not if it's going to stop working after 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lasts about a year
customer_reviews.text: Works great for a year. Loud enough and connects to my phone app. I like this design because it is thin to fit in my wallet. Haven't actually lost it yet but i sit on it and it doesn't start beeping like my keys do.
customer_reviews.author: Grant Fields

customer_reviews.title: Works great, saves me time and headache
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had Tile for a few months after my wallet was stolen/lost (who knows for sure). It’s helped me find it a few times when it has fallen under a seat or down in the couch already. Only negative I had to say about it is I wish the ringtone was obnoxiously loud so there was no doubt of where the item your Tile is attached to is. I’d give this 4.75 stars if possible.
customer_reviews.author: K. VanWagner

customer_reviews.title: helps
customer_reviews.text: I got this to go into the wallet i got at same time. Herschel Supply Co. Men's Roy RFID Blocking Wallet . Fits perfect. I lose my keys wallet and all that everyday. This helps soooo much. Could be louder but over all really helps
customer_reviews.author: Jsmith

customer_reviews.title: Great item.
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect. Fits into my wallet with no issues. Not bulky. You can use it to find your phone, you can also turn this feature off if you keep accidentally pressing it when the wallet is in your back pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Mason A

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with RFID Wallets
customer_reviews.text: I am tentatively writing this review because I’ve only had it for a day but I hope this helps someone who gets frustrated like Idid. If you wallet is RFID blocking.... this might not be for you. i mean, that just means the wallet is doing its job really well lol. My wallet luckily only had it on one side where my credit cards go and not on the side with my ID so I was able to slide it behind my ID. If yours is completely RFID blocking.... it’s not going to work. Sad day
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: no loop for key chain
customer_reviews.text: Works ok and a cool idea. What I wish they'd made more obvious is that this particular Tile doesn't have a hole or loop to attach to a keychain--which is what I bought it for.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Works ok but if app is not running on phone ...
customer_reviews.text: Works ok but if app is not running on phone you can't find phone if lost. Wish iPhone had a start up to not let it close down. Range is a concern
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Prime Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stick with the original tile
customer_reviews.text: Much prefer the original which has the hole for the Keychain. Also, when the slim is inside your wallet, it's actually hard to hear. I purchased the case for this, which fits nicely and have it attached to the outer strap of my wallet which is a wristlet.
customer_reviews.author: McDiven

customer_reviews.title: Range is horrible compared to the original tiles
customer_reviews.text: I’m a big fan of the tiles but wanted to try this wallet slim version. But it just doesn’t have the range of the normal tiles so was disappointed. Definitely going to just switch back to a normal tile for my wallet once the battery dies.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THESE THINGS
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THESE THINGS. would recommend them to everyone. the crowd GPS was tested and works. i left it at a local 7/11 store and i was notified two times by other users of its location.
customer_reviews.author: David H.

customer_reviews.title: Wanna make your marriage last?
customer_reviews.text: No more lost time waiting for my husband to find his wallet. This little tile has stopped many an argument. Thank you tile. My marriage is better because of you.
customer_reviews.author: JMC

customer_reviews.title: Great device
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband who is always loosing his personal effects. The wallet tile is great. We have had no battery issues yet, have been using for a few months now.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer21

customer_reviews.title: It would be nice if it wasn't quite so easy to inadvertently activate ...
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as advertised. It would be nice if it wasn't quite so easy to inadvertently activate (place in a padded section of your wallet so you don't set it off when you sit down, guys). Overall, it's saved my butt a couple of times.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Two words......Great product
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the Tile's for three years now. I can't tell you how nice it is to be able to find your keys, wallet, or purse quickly with Tiles attached to your items when there lost. The Tiles have worked perfectly every time. I do wish you could replace the battery on the Tiles, but that's probably not going to happen. Worth the price in long run though.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: If this review had a Tile, you would have read it sooner!1
customer_reviews.text: Tile Slim is not as big as it looks in photos online, it will easily fit into any wallet including those hidden pockets in men’s wallets. I lost my wallet weeks ago and had I used a Tile then I probably wouldn’t have gone through the hassle of replacing everything. I couldn’t give it 5 stars because I haven’t had to use the Tile technology as it’s advertised but I am sold on its capabilities after playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: N.

customer_reviews.title: Works better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: The chimes are cute, the app is useful, tracking history of last locations, and email updates on you when it's been found and the general vicinity where. It's all around a very solid and worthwhile product. The subscription isn't a terrible idea if you're like me and leave things everywhere especially getting out of the car.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Poor Connectivity
customer_reviews.text: The slim, while being sim, has very poor range inside of a wallet. You are therefore left with the choice of accepting poor connectivity coupled with a desirable form factor, or opting for the clunky, larger tile if you desire a good connection and for the product to actually serve its function.
customer_reviews.author: BkCfEsFm

customer_reviews.title: nice idea however my husband does not have a smart ...
customer_reviews.text: nice idea however my husband does not have a smart phone... ALSO thought it could hook up with alexa and could not,and for some reason they tried to help me to put app on tablet but was not compatible...main reason for returning...but I DID NOT PAY TO HAVE ITEM SHIPPED, SO WHY ARE THEY CHARGING ME TO RETURN??? n. randell
customer_reviews.author: Nrr

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my teenage son who has lost his wallet numerous times. Since we got the Tile either 1) he hasn’t lost his wallet or 2) the Tile works and I’m not looking everywhere for it! Great product for peace of mind either way.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Handy to have!
customer_reviews.text: Love what it does! Wallets are sometimes lost in the house great way to locate with tile. The only thing is I wish it could be smaller in size
customer_reviews.author: Regina Leung

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these. Come HIGHLY recommended by people with little ...
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these. Come HIGHLY recommended by people with little or no vision, so they can find important items...tough to do if you have no vision.
customer_reviews.author: desertdancer

customer_reviews.title: Really convenient and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Works really well. My husband is constantly losing both his wallet and phone so this comes in handy for both. My only warning is for a guy putting it in a wallet. DON'T put it in the billfold, put it in one of the credit card slots. My husband put his along with his cash and it fell out at some point... Worked fantastic for the three months before his lost it though!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanine West

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: For some reason it only worked 2 times, since then I cannot get it to beep when looking for my keys or phone....I only have it 2 months.... very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Loida

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work in wallet
customer_reviews.text: This is not suitable for use in wallet or credit card holder as it barely connects to Bluetooth and alerts you that you’ve left the house without your wallet even if it’s in your pocket
customer_reviews.author: Worricker

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy if you want it for keys
customer_reviews.text: The product might be good but it wasn't for what I wanted I want it for my keys. doesn't work for case you have to order different ones.
customer_reviews.author: Rapunzle

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, poor implementaion.
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of this product and use a Tile Sport for my keys. The Tile Slim just isn't loud enough to be useful at all. Once you're more than about 10 feet away, you can't hear the locator tone.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gregory

customer_reviews.title: The Slim Sucks
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the regular Tile and they are great, but the Slim is horrible. It has almost no range, and it keeps disconnecting from my iphone. I had to get a replacement, and that had the same issues. Don't waist your money, stick to the regular Tile.
customer_reviews.author: Julien

customer_reviews.title: NOT for back pocket wallet!!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT buy this for your wallet if it goes in your back pocket. Which to be honest is the only thing it's probably good for because any other possible use would benefit greatly from having a tile pro in both accuracy, durability, and long term use. I used this in my back pocket and maybe I was naive to think it would last but within a few weeks it has ceased to function on any level.
customer_reviews.author: Kayoum Cropper

customer_reviews.title: Very Good for the Price.
customer_reviews.text: Put the tile in your wallet. If you can't find your wallet you can make the tile beep from your phone. If you can't find your phone push the button on the tile in your wallet and the phone rings. 1 tile finds both.
customer_reviews.author: Lou d.

product_meta.title: Tile Slim (2016) - 1-pack - Discontinued by Manufacturer
product_meta.description: Size:1-Pack| Configuration:Tile Slim OnlyNever lose your wallet, purse or phone again with Tile Slim — the world’s thinnest bluetooth tracker. Tile Slim is the easiest, quickest and most reliable way to find your wallet, phone and more. As thin as two credit cards, you can slide, tuck or attach Tile Slim to anything Attach it to your notebook, laptop, or Kindle. Slip it into a tight spot like your wallet or jacket pocket. Then, use our simple app to make it ring or see the last place you had it. If it’s your phone you’re looking for, simply press your Tile Slim to make your phone ring — even if it’s on silent. With over 5 million Tile devices sold, the Tile community is the world’s largest lost and found network. Supported Apple Devices using iOS 8.1 and up: iPhone (Released 2011 or later): 4s, 5, 5c, 5s, 6, 6 Plus, 6s and 6s Plus iPad (Released 2012 or later): 3rd Gen, 4th Gen, Air iPad Mini, iPod Touch Apple Watch. Supported Android Devices using 4.4 or higher (KitKat or Lollipop): OnePlus One, Samsung Galaxy S5*, S6*, Samsung Note 4*, Note 5*, HTC One*, HTC One M8*, LG Nexus 4*, 5*, 6*. *IMPORTANT* Please be advised that Tile’s connectivity and app are affected by a known Bluetooth issue with devices using Android 6.0.0 (Marshmallow). Connectivity appears to be fixed in Android 6.0.1. Google has already begun to release 6.0.1, so please be sure to upgrade your OS as soon as it's available for your device. Thank you. Tile requires installation of the Tile App on iOS or Android, registration for a Tile account and acceptance of Tile’s Privacy Policy and Terms of Service (available at Tile.com). Payment required to access additional Premium services.
feature_bullets: As thin as two credit cards, tile slim easily slides into your wallet, purse or pocket. Tile slim can also be attached to a laptop, tablet, notebook or lunchbox. (Adhesives sold separately)
Use your smartphone to make your tile slim ring when it's nearby but out of sight. Water resistant: Upto IP57 standards
Can't find your phone? Simply double press the button on your tile slim to make your phone ring even on silent
The easy to use, free tile app remembers the last time and place it saw your tile, so if you left it somewhere, you'll always know where to look
If your tile isn't where you left it, you can anonymously enlist the help of the tile community in your search

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars2,983 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
